item.description:
At the last robotics group meeting, several participants came up with the idea of building a haunted house for Halloween. This will be the kickoff meeting for the haunted house.

Bring your ideas, research, and the skeletons in your closet so we can animate them.

I'm contacting several people in th area who already run Haunted Houses out of their homes on Halloween and inviting them to this meeting. If you know of anyone who may be interested, please pass this along.

Feel free to forward this invite to any appropriate email list.

All skill levels are welcome. And if you don't have much of a background in robotics, you can always help out while you learn.
item.how_to_find_us: At the intersection of route 2 and 128
item.name: Plan to build a haunted house for Halloween.
